data.text: @qldhealth Why are you insisting on bus drivers, cabbies and rideshare wearing masks?  Cops in cars, ambulance drivers and associates, politicians with associates in limo all seen not to wear masks.  Gerard and Palaschook totally out of touch and incredibly inept.
